类 Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Account
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    CurrentAccount, JuniorAccount, SaverAccount

    public abstract class Account
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Title: Account

    Description:

    作者:
    Yujie Yang account information includes unique account ID, password, customer who owns the account, transaction details and so on.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • addDeposit

        public void addDeposit(double i,
                       java.util.Date day,
                       int cash)

        Title: addDeposit

        Description: add new deposit record into the Arraylist of Transaction

        参数:
        i - the amount of money which is going to become deposit
        day - the date of the day created the deposit record
        cash - refers to consumer's choice of whether using cash to pay the deposit
